statements: SELECT * FROM liability_insurance;
SELECT policyholder_name, start_date, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policyholder_name, start_date, end_date, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance ORDER BY policy_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT policyholder_name, endorsement_details FROM liability_insurance WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY policy_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT policyholder_name, start_date, end_date, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance WHERE coverage_amount = 2500;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE coverage_amount >= 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, valid_from, valid_to FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE valid_from > '2022-01-01';
SELECT endorsement_id, endorsement_details FROM PolicyEndorsements ORDER BY endorsement_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount, valid_from, valid_to FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC, valid_from ASC;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY valid_from DESC
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE valid_to < '2023-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, valid_from FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE valid_from >= '2022-06-01' AND valid_to <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT endorsement_id, endorsement_details FROM PolicyEndorsements ORDER BY endorsement_id DESC
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverage WHERE valid_from >= '2022-09-01' AND valid_to <= '2022-10-31'
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails;
SELECT policy_number, insured_name, coverage_type FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT policy_number, premium_amount FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_phone FROM Policyholders WHERE policy_number LIKE 'P%';
SELECT endorsement_id, policy_number, endorsement_date FROM PolicyEndorsements ORDER BY endorsement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails;
SELECT policy_number, insured_name, coverage_type FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT insured_name FROM LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policyholder_id, holder_name, holder_address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY holder_name ASC;
SELECT endorsement_id, endorsement_date, endorsement_details FROM PolicyEndorsements ORDER BY endorsement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Liability_Policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM Liability_Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM Agents ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT endorsement_id, endorsement_date, endorsement_text FROM Endorsements WHERE endorsement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT holder_id, holder_name, holder_address FROM Policy_Holders ORDER BY holder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Liability_Policies LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM Liability_Policies ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Liability_Policies WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM Agents WHERE commission_rate < 10.00 ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address, holder_contact_number FROM Policy_Holders WHERE holder_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY holder_name;
SELECT * FROM Liability_Policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, effective_date FROM Liability_Policies WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM Endorsements WHERE endorsement_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT agency_name, agency_phone FROM Agency ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_phone FROM Agents WHERE agent_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Liability_Policies WHERE effective_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_details FROM Liability_Policies ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Endorsements WHERE endorsement_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Insured_Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_phone FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
